caption.p: Performance evaluations of predicted medicinal effects of natural compounds. (A) ROC curves for our method (blue), logistic regression (green), SVM (red), and XGBoost (purple). (B) ROC curves for our method (blue), fully-connected using all feature (green), fully-connected only using lagent knowledge (red), fully-connected only using molecular interaction (purple), and fully‚Äêconnected only using chemical property (brown).
